data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3139866,"name":"Asher Olgeirson","username":"Cynosure","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/cynosure/{size}/184875_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-05T02:43:44.042Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eRecently, I attempted to flash two limelights with the latest version of the limelight firmware. I didn’t see any issues with Escher and they were not powered on. I then turned the bot on and after around 5 minutes of nothing I power cycled the bot and waited another 10 minutes for them to boot. After nothing happened again, I flashed both of them to 2023.0 and waited for 15 minutes when the robot was on. After I got no results (again), I flashed them to the latest version again where nothing happened. Has anyone had similar issues in the past and what should I try next?\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2023-02-05T02:43:44.042Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":55,"reads":57,"readers_count":56,"score":301.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":425813,"topic_slug":"limelight-2-not-booting-after-flash","display_username":"Asher Olgeirson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/reducing-limelight-botpose-inaccuarcy/425814/4","internal":true,"reflection":true,"title":"Reducing Limelight Botpose inaccuarcy","clicks":3}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":51179,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/limelight-2-not-booting-after-flash/425813/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3301891,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2024-02-05T02:44:31.756Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
